lead_paragraph: President Obama condemned many of Donald J. Trump’s ideas and urged the use of logic in politics in a commencement address on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: At Rutgers, Obama Swipes at Trump but Doesn’t Name Him
headline.main: Obama Swipes at Trump, but Doesn’t Name Him, in Speech at Rutgers

snippet: President Obama condemned many of Donald J. Trump’s ideas and urged the use of logic in politics in a commencement address on Sunday.
abstract: Pres Obama uses commencement speech at Rutgers University to pointedly criticize Donald J Trump, despite never naming presumptive Republican presidential nominee; cites progress made under his presidency in remarks some see as start of focused effort to influence presidential campaign.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
